Super job!\n You\'ve completed all the tasks with this letter!\n Move on to the next one.
Choose the letter you want to learn.\n You can find the revision of all letters at the end of the alphabet.
Choose the task to learn the letter \"%1$s\".
Listen to the sound of the letter \"%1$s\" and the words that contain it and learn them.
Choose the picture with the word with the letter \"%1$s\".
Put the appropriate words near the pictures.\n To get a hint, click on the picture.

Use the letters of the alphabet to write the correct word.
 To check the word, press ✓.
 To delete a letter, press ←.
 To get a hint, click on the picture.
Choose the letter the speaker is pronouncing.\n Click the sound icon to listen to the letter again.
Match the words to the pictures.\n To get a hint, click on the picture.
Complete the gaps with appropriate letters, words, and pictures.
Learn all the letters of the Nivkh alphabet and come back here again!

Amazing!!!
You have learned all the letters of the Nivkh alphabet in %1$s days!!! 
This is an amazing result! 

Enter your first and last name.

The educational application “Nivkh Alphabet” offers children interesting tasks about letters. Children will easily learn all the letters of the Nivkh alphabet with help of the cheerful and bright pictures. A simple interface and audio will allow them to learn without your help. 
	When a student completes all the tasks, he/she will get a diploma. 

	The project “45 Years of the Nivkh Alphabet” was implemented by the Nogliki Central Model Library named after V.M.Sangi, Information and cultural educational center “Dominanta” with the support of Sakhalin Energy LLC.
